entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
